steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction start --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction add ghs.googlehosted.com. --name=${_ID}.view-store.${_DOMAIN}.${_SERVICE}.staging.${_NETWORK} --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --type=CNAME --ttl=86400 --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction execute --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction abort --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta run domain-mappings create --platform=managed --service=${_DOMAIN}-view-store-${_ID} --domain=${_ID}.view-store.${_DOMAIN}.${_SERVICE}.staging.${_NETWORK} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}-staging --region=${_GCP_REGION} || exit 0
